pages.text: What's better than a Soil Testkit? A Soil Testkit with unlimited uses!$(br)If water is infinite, why isn't this? Mixing rare materials from the depths of the 3 different dimensions into water allows you to exploit its regenerating properties, making your testkit last forver.$(br)However, it prevents you from recycling without losing those properties, so make sure you don't waste your resources...$(br)
